verses.name: Genesis 24:20
verses.text: And she hasted, and emptied her pitcher into the trough, and ran again unto the well to draw water, and drew for all his camels.

verses.name: Genesis 24:21
verses.text: And the man wondering at her held his peace, to wit whether the Lord had made his journey prosperous or not.

verses.name: Genesis 24:22
verses.text: And it came to pass, as the camels had done drinking, that the man took a golden earring of half a shekel weight, and two bracelets for her hands of ten shekels weight of gold;
